channel.title: CVE Feed for Ubiquiti -- EdgeRouter
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ubiquiti -- EdgeRouter

item.title: CVE-2023-31998|2024-08-02T15:03:28.590Z -- ubiquiti -- edgerouter
item.description: A heap overflow vulnerability found in EdgeRouters and Aircubes allows a malicious actor to interrupt UPnP service to said devices.
